subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: D’Angelo Harrison, who spent two exhibition games in Coach Steve Lavin’s doghouse, broke out in the Red Storm’s season opener, scoring 22 points as St. John’s rallied to beat visiting Detroit.
snippet: D’Angelo Harrison, who spent two exhibition games in Coach Steve Lavin’s doghouse, broke out in the Red Storm’s season opener, scoring 22 points as St. John’s rallied to beat visiting Detroit.
